abstract: The first ratings results that include DVR playback during television's premiere week arrived Monday and in many cases provided some good news for series, especially several new comedies.
snippet: The first ratings results that include DVR playback during television's premiere week arrived Monday and in many cases provided some good news for series, especially several new comedies.
lead_paragraph: The time is coming when judgments about television shows based on initial ratings may be a foolish policy - especially with more and more viewers using recording devices to watch shows long after they have been first broadcast.

headline.main: DVRs Bring Some Shows a Ratings Boost
